verses.roman:
kālidāsa kahe,--"ṭhākura, kṛpā kara more
tomāra darśane āinu mui patita pāmare

synonyms: kālidāsa kahe—Kālidāsa replied; ṭhākura—my dear saintly person; kṛpā kara—bestow your mercy; more—upon me; tomāra darśane—to see you; āinu—have come; mui—I; patita pāmare—very fallen and sinful.
translation: Kālidāsa replied, "My dear sir, please bestow your mercy upon me. I have come to see you, although I am very fallen and sinful.
